entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 10:00 PM AST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 March 2023
